title: Nomination Sent to The Senate | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House




April 21, 2009

 



Nomination Sent to The Senate




THE WHITE HOUSE Office of the Press Secretary -------------------------------------  For Immediate Release          April 20, 2009 NOMINATION SENT TO THE SENATE: David H. Stevens, of Virginia, to be an Assistant Secretary of  Housing and Urban Development, vice Brian D. Montgomery. # # #
